website_summaries.verdict: DeWALT DPG55-11C safety glasses offer a better fit than other "one size fits most" models, but durability and scratch resistance are issues. We like the use of rubber to improve wearer comfort, and the added brow-level protection.
pros: Rubberized frame is extremely adjustable, due to telescoping temple design
Padded temples provide extra protection from dust and debris
Anti-fogging polycarbonate lenses extend below eyes
cons: Adjustments seen as "gimmicky" by some users

customer_reviews.title: I'm tired because of these glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I can't fog these lenses up. And the frame adjusts in three directions on each arm to sit perfectly on your face. They're too comfortable. How am I supposed to know when I'm working hard and it's time for a break if my eye pro doesn't fog, and the frames are too comfortable? I'm getting way too much stuff done now. People are going to expect more from me and I can't let them know I'm capable of more. I'll be run ragged.
customer_reviews.author: Nate C

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and good protection. No anti-fogging
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these glasses fit and feel - ratcheting temples are very handy, especially wearing with ear protection muffs. The only thing that I'm not happy with - they are not anti-fogging, as promised in description. Have to clean every few minutes when it's hot. I use them for shooting at indoor range; will have to find something with real anti-fogging
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry I

customer_reviews.title: Good clear lens
customer_reviews.text: We bought these glasses for the protection from flying objects and they offer UV protection as well. We have a lot of trees in our yard and the regular tinted glasses are to dark to see there you have cut and where you have missed. My wife has had cataract surgery so the UV protection is very important. She cuts the yard while I do the weed eating. The glasses have good adjustment points for use by male or female and are very comfortable. I did buy a couple of other Dewalt glasses but I like these the best. I guess my next pair will be the anti fog glasses because all the ones I have sure do fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grant

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and No Fog!
customer_reviews.text: After countless hours of searching, comparing, and buying other glasses only to be disappointed - you've finally arrived at the last pair of safety glasses you'll ever need. As a nurse, wearing safety glasses is paramount when screening patients for COVID-19 and these check all the boxes. They are incredibly comfortable, lightweight, easily adjustable for a customized fit and most important to me - they DO NOT FOG UP even with a mask on. They are so comfortable after I spent several minutes looking for them one day I literally forgot I was already wearing them. What are you waiting for? Go buy them now. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: rock of the wood

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in my purchase. First, I thought I was buying tinted safety glasses, but realized after submitting my order, that under the description, it said clear. I attempted to email the seller, but I didn't get a response. I got clear glasses as described, but I already get free clear glasses from my employer, so already wasn't impressed that I spent almost $10 for something I could have grabbed from the shop. But then they had so many adjustments, they were constantly going "wonkey" on me and having to be corrected. I tossed them and went back to my standard issues. Less issues. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: David "DJ" Gerde

customer_reviews.title: Good quality safety glass for outdoor contractor work environment
customer_reviews.text: I'm an OSHA safety trainer, and give away safety glasses as a gift to my students. These are a good quality safety glass for outdoor contractor work environment. They will hold up to most basic work activity - I think. As long as they are not abused, like leaving them in the tool box unprotected, or laying them on the dashboard of the truck, etc. Decent safety glasses should not cost a lot, since they are commonly viewed as short life disposable PPE.
customer_reviews.author: El Loco Doggie

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For & More
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to protect my eyes against COVID, but they also protected me on a subsequent repair job with epoxy. I can't rate them on scratch resistance because I haven't worn them enough. (One of the problems with these reviews is that you're happy with them for month or so, and then the product goes bad. I've had this happen with 5 consecutive electric blankets. Then they won't help you because the 30-day period has expired.)
customer_reviews.author: The Nibble

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: These fog up instantly and are slow to de-fog just like most safety glasses I've tried during fire and rescue. They fit great, but I dislike the up and down adjustment option at the very corner of these glasses...it's way too easy to bump them and then they sit crooked on your face (most of the time my hands are busy and I can't mess with my glasses for long periods of time). Overall, for Dewalt, these feel flimsy and cheap...I am used to Dewalt tools feeling heavy duty and rugged and like they'll last a lifetime - these feel like any cheap pair of safety glasses that will break after a few rough outings.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Mckean

customer_reviews.title: All day wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight. All day comfort. I enjoy the ability to adjust the fit. Be sure to check your selection before submitting your order. I ordered the wrong ones. The seller (California Tools Inc) was so helpful and was quick to respond to my concerns. They guided me through the process of getting my order corrected. The customer service is top notch. I will continue to use this company and refer this company.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate Tool Guy eye protection
customer_reviews.text: Style-wise, you're not going to find much cooler-looking eye protection. I got the so-called "indoor-outdoor" lens, which is lightly mirrored and slightly light-blocking. But in the "smoke" or "silver mirror" lens, these could stand in as a pair of sunglasses. They feel pretty high quality, though they pick up light scratches as all plastic lenses do. But it's that yellow DeWalt logo and trim that reminds you these are "tool guy" glasses, and give you the extra confidence to handle any job.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K. Seibold

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting portection
customer_reviews.text: The virus can be spread up to six feet and enter the body through the eyes. I did not know this. I covered my nose and mouth from the beginning. Not taking any chances with 41000 Floridians with the virus. But once this is over and we will get thru it hopefully soon and with fewer lives lost I will use them doing my work. They are safety glasses after all but stylish enough to wear to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: diverdown48

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I sweat a lot and sometimes wear these glasses with a lot of other gear on. They do fog up but much less than any of the other safety glasses I've used before and they clear up quick enough for me not to get frustrated haha I especially like that a lot of the parts are adjustable because it helps with the comfort level depending on what I'm wearing or not wearing with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Average Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fogged instantly
customer_reviews.text: Have to wear a mask at work during covid hype. They provide safety glasses but they fog up, I bought these because all the reviews say no fog. As soon as I took my fist breath with mask and these on they fogged up. Absolutely no different than my regular safety glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: **NOT DURABLE**
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he wanted to protect his eyes while doing yard work. While attempting to put them on for the third time (Yes, the 3rd time), it fell apart. What that tells me is that these glasses are cheaply made and extremely fragile. Hmmmm...but how can a safety glasses be fragile??? It just does not make sense. On the contrary, it does look stylish and it suits my husband's face quite nicely but unfortunately, Dewalt safety glasses do not last at all. It was a waste of money and pretty much useless at this point.
customer_reviews.author: JamRock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, tinted safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear safety glasses 9.5 hours a day in our body shop, and these are great! Nice close, and comfortable fit. Lightly tinted, but may not be the best for indoor use unless you have extreme lighting like in our shop. It's almost daylight inside our shop. Very adjustable to fit anyone I would imagine. See photos. ANSI rated see photo. Worth it for me!
customer_reviews.author: Beaufort SC

customer_reviews.title: Lens a bit darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice safety glasses that offer good protection. Lens are a bit darker than I expected and I probably won’t use them in low light situations. Lightweight. Comfortable. As a “head sweater” I have trouble with fogging if the glasses fit too tight and don’t allow air flow—these are pretty good in that aspect. Recommended for weed whacking and other jobs in bright sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these not consider purchasing them again
customer_reviews.text: There are couple of major issues for me. - inconsistent tint - a slight warp in the plastic. Both issues leave each eye looking through a partial warp and different tints. My eyes have a hard time focusing after wearing these for 20minutes. Also, the packaging they come in has left lots of little scratches where they touched. I thought they were my finger prints, only to realize they had come that way. I would not recommend these not consider purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Levite

customer_reviews.title: No fog. Still can't see
customer_reviews.text: The description of anti fog of these glasses is technically correct. While using these glasses, they didn't fog up once. Instead, little droplets of water formed on the lenses. I had great visibility for the first 10 seconds the glasses were on, after that, droplets. I also do not like that the arms of the glasses adjust vertically that makes it very difficult to put the glasses on with one hand
customer_reviews.author: ibigler

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product.
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious to wear this safety glasses, as soon i took them out the package i noticed a scratch on the left lense, theres also a mark on the plastic cover so i know they came like that, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: No fog glasses!!  Protect your eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: Until now all glasses would fog up on me. This is the first pair of glasses that do not fog up on me! I ordered them originally for my husband and he really liked them because they didn't fog up on him! I keep borrowing them to mow the grass because they are the only glasses in this house that don't fog up on me! I'm ordering another pair! I spent over $90. in the last 15 months trying to find the right glasses that wouldn't fog when my husband was working and obstruct his vision. He would take the glasses off and his eyes were left unprotected. He keeps these on! Order these you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary long

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for personal use around work. I’m an iron worker and we have to wear safety glasses on premises. The company provides cheap ones and they’re super uncomfortable and inconvenient. These work great. Easily adjust them to where you want them to sit comfortably on your face and they stay. They actually work haha they lasted me about 4 months compared to the 3 weeks it took for the cheap ones to wear out. So good my superintendent went and bought everyone a pair for a trial period to see if it’s more affordable for the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Schneider

customer_reviews.title: You won't shoot your eye out.
customer_reviews.text: I like protecting my eyes while I work on various things, and I can never not have enough safety glasses. These are ok, the shape is great, and they protect my eyes, however because they are adjustable and I constantly put on ear protection, or a dust mask or am just scratching my head, I find that the adjustable arms constantly move and that gets rather annoying while working on a project.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable glasses
customer_reviews.text: I own two pairs of the clear for when I'm working in the garage with someone else. I love how many different adjustments you can make to these glasses giving them the perfect fit on anyone's face. I'm not 100% sure about the anti-fog claim, but I didn't expect any glasses to be completely fog resistant.
customer_reviews.author: mkcro

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but annoying reflect/glare to eye
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made light weight glasses. The main issue is that in the description it is not mentioned that lens has a reflective/mirror-like coating on both sides which cause glare and reflection of my own eyebrow and eye to my eye! It is really annoying to see a glare and reflection is constantly blocking your view. Requested return and seller actually refunded without return.
customer_reviews.author: R-Dash

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses after my other safety glasses continued to fog up. The glasses are comfortable and sit well on my face. I like the adjustments on the arms and they seem to be well made. the wide arms do not sit well while wearing over the ear type hearing protection though and become very uncomfortable after a few minutes. Other than that issue they area a decent pair of safety glasses and don't have the fogging problem that other safety glasses have.
customer_reviews.author: JPTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Optically Clear Lenses with Adjustable Temples (Length & Height)
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are a good value for the price and I like the adjustable temples - both length and height , comfortable fit and optically clear lenses. One minor negative: the adjustable temples are a double-edged sword as the mechanism which permits a personalized fit can also move unintentionally if you quickly pull the glasses from your face. They're easy enough to readjust if this happens. Otherwise, simply remove them deliberately and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ginwraith

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice glasses and the anti-fog works quite well
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice glasses and the anti-fog works quite well. Quality is excellent as well as fit. The angle adjustment is more of an annoyance that anything else. I have never found that feature to be very useful. Another complaint is that the temples are too thick to fit comfortably under ear muffs, which is frequently how I wear eye protection. These are a fantastic price for the quality, but I will probably go back to buying the Encon glasses as they fit my quite well and I don't have to worry about messing with adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt makes good tools AND safety glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable sides for comfort. Seems sturdy and well made. Think it will become easier for me to get in the habit of wearing them more often. I didn't wear my other safety glasses as often as I should because they were uncomfortable. Plus these won't fog up on me when I'm sanding for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeephers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable to wear all day, due to the adjustability of the temples, both in length and angle. It makes it easy to get them to set level on your face even with one ear higher than the other. The soft nose piece and the rubber like brow pad keeps them fitting nicely, and so far they haven't fogged up or made it feel like my eyeballs were cooking. The lenses are very clear and haven't developed any scratches so far. The only potential issue I can see is that they appear a bit delicate simply because of the adjustability, but time will tell. So far I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisLJ

customer_reviews.title: To good
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have to many adjustments. Every time I toss them onto the work bench, one or more of the adjustments get messed up. After spending an extra minute readjusting them each time I put them back on I concluded my old glasses were faster and just as effective. That said, once they are adjusted, they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: they fog up pretty instantly. from a dewalt faithful
customer_reviews.text: purchased these glasses, used them once. put them in the tray in my tool box. next day, they had unfortunately fallen in with my tools (hammer, flat-bar etc etc) and they had scratches everywhere to the point of being nearly unusable. mind you, they didnt get shuffled to the bottom, just landed in with them. besides that, if you work hard, they fog up pretty instantly. from a dewalt faithful, i expected a better product, but these glasses really are no better than a set youd get handed to you in a highschool shop class.
customer_reviews.author: Vaen

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are very good glasses for the money. Admittedly, I am just a DIYer and don’t really test the glasses, but they have yet to scratch or fog. I would give them 5 stars but the nose piece is very flimsy and doesn’t stay in place. They are still fairly comfortable and better than others at the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Northern VA

customer_reviews.title: Very good protective glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are good. I haven't noticed them being particularly anti-fog, but then I bought them to jog in during snowstorms and I'm not sure anything wouldn't fog in those conditions. They are well-made and are excellent for the price. Now I mostly wear them for cycling to keep bugs out of my eyes when the sunshine is dull enough so that I don't need sunglasses. They are nicely adjustable and look as good as much more expensive glasses, in my opinion. I've had them for maybe a year and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Deardon

customer_reviews.title: Go with No-cry version..
customer_reviews.text: The ratchting temple adjusters are a gimmick. If they ratchet up or down accidentally while putting on or removing, the glasses immediately look off kilter/unballanced on the face. Its a game trying to get them to look even with the face do to the poor design feature, what looked good on paper stinks in reality. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Spiral

customer_reviews.title: they are clear and pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are doing the job but the adjustable side pieces are too easy to adjust and they misalign AS I put them on. I must repeatedly take them off, align, and carefully put them back on. Its fine for the most part but I wouldn't recommend them or buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight and easy on nose - but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would be more scratch resistant but so far, it has a lot of scratches and vision is not very clear anymore. I had bought 2 pairs and both pairs are scratched up. Otherwise really like the comfort. You can adjust the angle of how it sits on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyTreehouse

customer_reviews.title: Not good for mask and cold environment.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t work well at all in cold environment. I work at a food processing plant and since we started having to wear masks, my safety glasses were fogging up all the time. There just no way to seal the gap between the nose and eyes. So I figured anti fog glasses would be perfect. Nope, not at all. The warm air from breathing hits the glasses and they fog right up so much that it actually drips off of the lens. I can still use them for anything else not involving masks but the whole point of getting them was for the anti fog while wearing a mask and it fails.
customer_reviews.author: Adam McKim

customer_reviews.title: I was like that explains why I feel the need to rinse ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear on my truck while grilling, cuz way too much grease was getting in my eyes. My employee had glasses on and they got so greasy, I was like that explains why I feel the need to rinse my eyes out all the time, geez. I've had these for several months now and they've held up great. Durable and they do their job, no more grease in my eyes :) The side pieces that go behind your ears are adjustable up or down
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: NOT ANTI FOG
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely 100% NOT fog resistant, I wear a hard hat and safety glasses every day at work, and recently having to wear a face mask was fogging up my safety glasses, so I bought these, ( specifically because they are "anti-fog") and they are not
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a blocky large head and always have problems finding glasses that fit my face and don't slip down off my nose without being to tight on the sides. These glasses have so many adjustments to get the perfect fit. Been wearing them while working outside in the cold and no issues fogging as claimed. So comfortable you forget your even wearing them sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: If no others have worked...
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated...most comfortable, completely functional eye protection. I have a rather small nose bridge & high cheekbones. These are the only glasses without some sort of nose pads that fit me perfectly. Has to be a more decent fit for 90% of wearers. Easy ear adjustments let you make it most comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: T. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Solid Protection
customer_reviews.text: This fit nice and snug. They do fog a bit but my workshop is hot and I sweat a lot. I wear these for long periods and they are very comfortable for long use. I would recommend these and would definitely buy these safety glasses again.
customer_reviews.author: AshKum

customer_reviews.title: Great value for functional and stylish eye protection
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased DeWalt safety glasses for years finding the to be a great value for functional and stylish eye protection. These clear glasses are best for indoor work in clean environments and can be worn comfortably all day. Also great for outdoor work in low-light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: WojoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nothing in my eyes
customer_reviews.text: First day of use, I still got hit in the eye with these on within the first 3 seconds. Been using them every time I need the protection. And so far, I haven't got hit in the eye again. Haven't had any fogging up yet. They are comfortable to wear with no slipping down the noise. There are a few points of adjustment on these glasses which is nice for fitting to your comfort. I do wish the yellow piece the goes against/close to your forehead would be more on the forehead to block debrides from falling down. The clear lens are great for seeing in low level lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Solid Gear

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and lightweight. I have not had any issues with scratches yet. My only negative would be that they are definitely not fog resistant. They fog up super easy no matter the temperature or humidity level.
customer_reviews.author: Loveit

customer_reviews.title: Great Shooting Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I use these for shooting, and then when they get a bit nicked up after 6 months or so, I use them for outdoor work. I like them very much. The fit is excellent, they don't fog, and they are durable. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alpine Doug

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I use these for wilderness search and rescue and they are perfect. They have so many areas you can adjust that it truly is one size fits all. There is no glare and once on you can easily forget they are there. I just drop these into my pack when I go out on a call and they get jumbled around with pocket knives, medical kits, flashlights etc. and have not gotten scratched or broken. I did have a little experience with fog build up once I stopped moving in outdoors in cold weather when my body temp raises from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: A retainer cord is a good idea.
customer_reviews.text: These are good safety glasses but they WON'T stay in a shirt pocket (way too long) nor hang onto the front of a shirt (too light and will bounce off). An eyeglass retainer cord will keep them from getting lost. If you don't buy a cord/hanger, you can expect to lose them if you trust your shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: T. French

customer_reviews.title: Good price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Good price on Amazon. Very adjustable and far more comfortable than traditional safety glasses. Of course, without the wrap around protection of traditional safety goggles, you are still exposed to dust. While a flying bit of debris might not hit you in the eye, I found that simply bending over quickly in a dusty room (removing dry wall) caused suspended particles in the air to go right into my eyes. So consider searching for the best pair of full coverage goggles in addition to having these around for the kind of work its suited for.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Worst glasses ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just lame over priced safety glasses. I never take the time to write reviews, especially bad ones. But these are the worst glasses I've ever had. The lenses scratch so easy I didn't know it was possible. And the adjustment joints are cheap. On my pair one side felt like it was going to break if I tried any harder to adjust it, the other side was so lose I had to readjust it every time I put them on. Just go with a simple pair of safety glasses from Nemesis, way better!
customer_reviews.author: RR45

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - does the job.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are a great value for the price. I work in an environment where I often have to go through areas that require me to wear safetly glasses. There are many spots on the glasses that are adjustable. You can even tilt the stems of the frame up or down. Nose-piece is comfortable. The glasses are reasonably durable as well. I haven't had any problems with the lenses scratching and they clean up nicely. I've found that I get about 4-6 months use out of a pair of these - using them just for occasional use - but I think thats a decent value given the price point. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nemo

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and durable. A lot of adjustability. Unfortunately, the way they are shaped is just plain uncomfortable. The press against your head behind your ears. I tried bending them out but no go. Returned, will have to go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Just like they said
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have been working well. On projects where I work, z87 is required, and these meet that standard. They are adjustable for comfort and don't fog. The frame is padded. This is a lot of quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SubterraneanMuskrat

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. Beside being functional, they look good. With the adjustable ear pieces, it allows you to adjust the lenses to actually close the gap around your face. The orange accent does not overpower the design and really looks good.
customer_reviews.author: designman63

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable over the ears and nose
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable over the ears and nose. I was a bit worried that the product would be too large since typical sunglasses are too large for my head, however the adjustable aspect of it is perfect. They arrived in the shortest setting, and that worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Although, when my goggles fell off my head and hit the concrete, they scratched pretty badly. I guess that is to be expected, but I'd have thought they'd be a little tougher than that.
customer_reviews.author: Wils

customer_reviews.title: These glasses work great and the cost is perfect
customer_reviews.text: These glasses work great and the cost is perfect. Husband purchased the clear and tinted and have been very happy with both sets. Just know that the tinted is a very dark shade and VERY hard to see indoors. This forces him to switch between glasses as he goes in- and outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Other safety glasses I've had fogged up quickly. These didn't. I haven't used them in real hot and humid weather yet, but in normal conditions, they worked much better than other glasses I've used. They are comfortable, too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fog up and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great safety glasses. I work in the TICU (trauma Intensive Care Unit). The ones I had before fogged up bad and hurt my ears. These are able to be adjusted and has never fogged up not even once. I bought two. Mahalo !! 🤙🏾
customer_reviews.author: V. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorites
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Dewalt safety glasses for a while now. However, I ran into problems when I was trying to work and my glasses fogged up. This was especially frustrating when I was up on a ladder. These glasses are great. It's hard to see in the picture, but there is a strip of foam across the top of the glasses that helps keep things from getting into your eyes through the top. I will probably buy the googles to use when I need extra protection, but these glasses are great for every day use. And the price is great. Your eyes are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Zero Fog!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate the slightest hint of fog in my glasses. Working construction going from the cold to indoors and having to keep your safety glasses on these are a life saver. I have had zero foul ups with these. Returned the ones work issued me and suggested to them to purchase these. I have already seen two other guys buy them and actually enjoy wearing them. Spend any time in safety glasses at all trying to make precise cuts through fog and you will realize that these are the best glasses ever!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip S.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my eyesight from a wayward racquetball
customer_reviews.text: I took a shot directly into the center of my eye from a powerful forehand. The glasses compressed into my face and flew off. Aside from bruising around the eye - thankfully no damage was done to my eyesight. They didn't break but I'm going to replace them just because you never know about the structural integrity after an impact. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Billingsly

customer_reviews.title: Carhartt safety glasses that I purchased on the same order are more comfortable, lighter and durable
customer_reviews.text: Side broke of at hinge shortly after I started to use them. Carhartt safety glasses that I purchased on the same order are more comfortable, lighter and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Calo97sh

customer_reviews.title: Great eye protection in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these DeWalt DPG55-2C safety glasses on a daily basis and the tint and the protection they give me is great. I have been wearing Dewalt safety glasses for years and have found them to be a great purchase for anyone needing eye protection while working in the sun. Their price is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: William Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I need to wear safety glasses all day for work. The adjustable nose piece does not hold. Over an hour or so of wearing these glasses the pads flatten out and you have hard plastic resting on your nose. Not happy at all. These safety glasses are on the heavy side as well.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Light and protective, and dare I say "stylin' " protective glasses
customer_reviews.text: Whether weed-eating, sawing wood with a chop saw, chain-saw, or other power tools, these glasses are light, protect well, and ventilate decently. If these ever break, or get damaged, I will get them again.
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using cheap harbor fright smoke safety glasses and they just don't cover my eyes like I want. These cover top and bottom and even the corners (which is what I wanted). On top of that they are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Anti-fog snake oil
customer_reviews.text: The Anti-fog feature is why I purchased this and I can tell you that these fog up very badly. At work we have to wear safety glasses and a medical mask due to the COVID pandemic. My breath escapes are the top of the mask and hits my glasses and immediately fogs them up preventing me from seeing what I’m doing. I do not recommend this if you’re after something that, at the time of purchasing, were labeled as anti fogging
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish protection
customer_reviews.text: This one fits the bill when working around the yard etc. Comfy and lightweight but notice that it easily scratches, I thought it would be a little more resilient to a work environment.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: great for wood cutting
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on the fog resistance. I have never worn any eye product by any company that did not fog when you wear over a face mask. Saw many reviews saying they do fog some and expect as much. They however, are a comfortable fit and offer nice eye wrap protection. The arm is adjustable which is a must have if your nose to ear reach is long. I wear these for working outside in the yard, weed eating, edging, and for cutting wood with a chainsaw. They work great for keeping debris out of the eyes. My wife has a pair too. We both love and recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Nifty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have been using disposable safety glasses for years. The do the job but are not very comfortable and even though I reuse the glasses, they get expensive since they must be replaced frequently. In contrast, the Dewalt DPG55-C1 glasses are exceptionally comfortable, provide excellent clarity and coverage, have been immune to machine oils and have taken a lot of abuse. In reality, I expect that the glasses will be classified as a "consumable". They should last for a decent period of time but not years (in my abusive environment). In circumstances where more care is taken, they should last a very long time. In any event they are inexpensive so I can afford to have several for standbys.
customer_reviews.author: NewCo Builder

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, they replaced my jogging sunglasses and are my go to for eye protection when mountain biking
customer_reviews.text: Use them when mowing lawn or jogging. Felt odd running with DeWalt safety glasses on the track but they work. I also use them when mountain biking now. One stray rock flying into my face from the trail convinced me this was a great idea. They protected my eyes just as I expected from both stray flying bugs and debris from the trail.
customer_reviews.author: TadN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those wearing an N95
customer_reviews.text: As long as they are clean, your mouth steam will not obscure your vision. Fit and feel good. Adjustable. Priced fair. as a Stationary Engineer these things get a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: sir buystuff

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Little darker than I wanted, but good for the price. The folding joints are not very rugged and I wonder how long they will last, but they are very comfortable and give great, full eye, protection. The inside of the head piece that rests on your forehead is a soft foam material, sturdy yet supple.
customer_reviews.author: 5150hillbilly

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Like how they look on me. Very fashionable . Comfortable lightweight and a clear view. They don’t fog up. Absolutely love them. Can’t believe the low price. Gonna order another pair for backup. I do housekeeping and the cleaning products sometimes get in my eyes. Absolutely hate that. Or even dust from dusting.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt name and reviews sold me, but in first use right temple arm became looser than left even with same tight screw. Maybe a fluke. Fit nice and very adjustable. Good for sunlight too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anneken

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: this is the kind of safety glasses you forget your wearing. I've gone to the Walmart wearing these things and after all isn't that exactly what you want in safety?
customer_reviews.author: benjamin d.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eye protection.
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses. After rubbing white soap to the lenses and rubbing it off it never fogged on me. I also have a very large head and it never gave me any discomfort. I use it on the shooting range as well as yard work. Never forget on me, good comfort, and protected my eyes very well. I won't use this if you have to work in a dusty environment. Sawdust and pollen will get to your eyes since there isn't a seal.other than that it will protect your eyes well. The yellow color makes me find then easy if I forget when I place them
customer_reviews.author: MDbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My husband always fusses at me for not wearing safety glasses while working on various projects. My problem is that most make my face sweat so much that within minutes of working in the Florida heat, I cannot see what I'm doing. I took a chance on the Dewalt glasses because I have been favorably impressed with their other products. I was not disappointed. These are simply the best safety glasses I have ever owned. Guess hubby will have to find something else to fuss about.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mankowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I was getting tired of wearing my old scratched & dirty safety glasses. These fit the bill nicely & haven’t fogged up yet but we’ll see—I’m a real test for anti-fogging gear. I get pretty sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: double0salesman

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Pair of Safety Glasses I Have Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. These glasses are super light and the venting around the nose bridge allows your eye area to breathe and not get fogged up or sweaty. I also appreciate the curvature of the lens as I have long eyelashes and they do not touch the lenses. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: eNOS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ndoor / Outdoor Safety Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I use these as both safety glasses and sun glasses because I don't like dark sunglasses. This removes the UV rays and my eyes don't hurt when I wear these outside (like they used to). They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Glena S.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses for cadaver lab. They are clear and hold up to their claims, they do not fog up. I am happy with the product. I am a petite female and they fit my head well. They are pliable and I believe they should fit most faces/heads without being too loose or too tight for wearer. Happy with purchase. Great product for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Talisa Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Get an extra pair, make life easier!
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of functional safety glasses for a great price. I have kids running around my shop, and the first thing on the list after tape measures for "items that magically disappear" are my safety glasses. So I have several pairs of these in hiding, so when one pair disappears I can pull out another and keep working. I expect one ALL of my glasses will make their way home and I will have a giant stack of glasses. Until then, these are very nice and inexpensive enough that I can just keep an extra pair or two on hand and prevent the down time and frustration of continually searching for my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Hazer

customer_reviews.title: Antifog works great!
customer_reviews.text: They truly have been helping when wearing the N95 and face masks that we now have to wear all day at work, biking and functioning! Thank you for an awesome product that allows me to see while fogged up!💚🌻
customer_reviews.author: Teena Sun

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these for my m-cycle and scooter. Finally! A pair of glasses that don't fog up! Scratch resistance seems OK for now...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Green

customer_reviews.title: ... so long to get a pair with anti-fog but glad I finally ordered a pair
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to get a pair with anti-fog but glad I finally ordered a pair. I'm a petite female and they fit my face fine without feeling oversized. A Dewalt product and the quality is definitely there compared to discount pairs I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyTab

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fantastic service
customer_reviews.text: Great product my last pair lasted probably five years service for this company is great they are fast and always reliable please buy with confidence Troy
customer_reviews.author: tea

customer_reviews.title: I bought the goggles for my son to wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the goggles for my son to wear them in the evening when we are going biking, so there I don't have to pick up the dead bugs out of his eyes. It is a bit big for a normal sized 8 years old
customer_reviews.author: Adriciu

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I should get some more of these...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses to use on a couple of projects that I had coming up, both on my motorcycle and my car. I never had any other safety glasses before, but these glasses seem to work pretty well. I had them on last night for about three hours, doing maintenance on my motorcycle. The glasses were very clear, and they never fogged up. They were also very comfortable, and never bothered me a bit. I also appreciated the fact that they weren't slipping forward, and they never dropped down. All in all, very pleased with the product, and I seriously consider getting a couple extra of these to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitris

customer_reviews.title: Really is antifog
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear with N95 mask because my regular glasses fog. These did the trick and I have had no issues with fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... either but compare to my other ones these are better plus they adjust pretty nice you can tilt them ...
customer_reviews.text: I do drywall and frame compare to my other safety glasses they will fog out a lot these still get foggy doesn’t really prevent it either but compare to my other ones these are better plus they adjust pretty nice you can tilt them back or forward make one side higher than the other one lol make them short or long tight at the nose or loose at the nose they are great classes I got them like 2 months ago and still use them today great buy
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to the DeWalt standard you would expect. Very clear bend in the glasses that distorts what you’re looking at. Also, service from this retailer is horrible. Took a month to arrive, even after I requested a refund multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of the virus and works well, also especially when i go out very early in morn it keeps the bugs out of my face/eyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The adjustable arms make it hard to keep on my head because they do not stay put. Thw nose grommets are equally as frustrating. Other than that the lenses work well.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and anti-fog functionality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the glasses for the anti-fog feature as I use them to mow and my former safety glasses frequently fogged up. These worked great. I also like the ability to adjust the temple arms and nose guards. I would like it if the temple arms stayed more securely in the desired location where they attach to the front of the frame. They move easily to another position once adjusted. The length adjustment on the arms worked well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: My Dewalt tinted safety glasses arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I have a few pairs of safety glasses, both tinted and clear, and these are still my favorite pair. They're very comfortable and light and I often forget I'm wearing them as they could double for sunglasses. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Too many features make heavy glasses
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these at all because they are relatively heavy and the ratcheting temple adjustment regularly shifted, making readjustment necessary at almost every use. The cushioned brow protection was uncomfortable, hot, bulky and heavy. I was glad when I lost them in the woods so I could justify trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: wavey

customer_reviews.title: It's good but it's not anti fog
customer_reviews.text: If they mean by Anti-fog, that it will not fog up over time and your view will not become distorted then yes these seem like a good deal. But if they mean they will not fog up while you are wearing them (let's say in your shed doing menial tasks on a fair weather day)...look elsewhere. I like it for its basic protection and clarity (nice and clear view) and because it's better than those bulky ones that get in the way. Buuuuut they fogged up right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Warrior

customer_reviews.title: reviews are true
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because all the other glasses i have bought fog up or slip off your head or and hard to see through. These are light weight and fit small heads. Does not fog up!
customer_reviews.author: Keely

product_meta.title: Dewalt DPG55-1C Dual Comfort Clear High Performance Protective Safety Glasses with Dual-Injected Rubber Frame and Temples
feature_bullets: Rubber tipped temples provide a secure comfortable fit.
Tough, polycarbonate lens provides impact resistance.
Telescoping temples adjust for a comfortable fit.
Cushioned brow protection for extra comfort and protection
Ratcheting temples adjust for a proper fit.
